duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive nursing care to emergency room patients in a critical access hospital setting.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to conduct triage assessments and provide immediate care.
Administer emergency medicine and monitor patient response and progress.
Manage and coordinate patient care, ensuring timely and effective interventions.
Work as part of a 2-RN team, providing mid-shift support and maintaining patient safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (RN) or a related field (Master's preferred)
